        <h2><a href="/video/march-16-2018-beamdog-livestream">March 16 2018 Beamdog Livestream</a></h2>
    <span property="dc:title" content="March 16 2018 Beamdog Livestream" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span><span property="sioc:num_replies" content="0" datatype="xsd:integer" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>
      <span class="submitted"><span property="dc:date dc:created" content="2018-03-16T12:38:40-07:00" datatype="xsd:dateTime" rel="sioc:has_creator">Fri, 2018-03-16 12:38 — <span class="username" xml:lang="" about="/users/nwn-news" typeof="sioc:UserAccount" property="foaf:name" datatype="">NWN News</span></span></span>
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p>Trent and Phil discuss what Neverwinter NIghts: Enhanced Edition features will be available at launch and chat about the latest update.</p></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="https://neverwintervault.org/sites/neverwintervault.org/files/media/29079/images/bd.jpg" title="March 16 2018 Beamdog Livestream" class="colorbox" data-colorbox-gallery="gallery-node-29079-z8NJg7niMTg"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="https://neverwintervault.org/sites/neverwintervault.org/files/styles/thumbnail/public/media/29079/images/bd.jpg?itok=ux6ihv5M" width="120" height="120" alt="" title="" /></a></div></div></div>  </div>
